history.proof: intros a b c H. apply Z.bits_inj'. intros n Hn. assert (Z.testbit a n = Z.testbit b n). - unfold Z.sub in H at 1. sauto l: on depth: 3. - sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: assert (Z.testbit a n = Z.testbit b n).
exceptions.tactic: apply equal_f with (x := n) in H.
exceptions.exn: The reference equal_f was not found in the current environment.

ctx: assert (Z.testbit a n = Z.testbit b n).
exceptions.tactic: unfold Z.sub, Z.mul, Z.add, Z.opp, Z.of_nat, Z.add_mult, Z.sub_mult, Z.sub.
exceptions.exn: The reference Z.add_mult was not found in the current environment.

ctx: assert (Z.testbit a n = Z.testbit b n).
exceptions.exn: In environment a, b, c : Z H : (a + - c)%Z = (b - c)%Z n : Z Hn : (0 <= n)%Z Unable to unify "(a + - c)%Z = (b - c)%Z" with "Z.testbit a n = Z.testbit b n".

original: intros a b c H. apply Z.bits_inj'. intros n Hn. assert (Z.testbit a n = Z.testbit b n). - apply equal_f with (x := n) in H. unfold Z.sub in H at 1. unfold Z.sub, Z.mul, Z.add, Z.opp, Z.of_nat, Z.add_mult, Z.sub_mult, Z.sub. simpl in H. apply H. auto.
